name: Frozenweb repack
short_description: The newest compiled arcemu core's lua++/moon++ engines databases dbc's scripts!and bug fixes for frozenweb repack,and the whole repack is not in the svn.Before we had used filefront to upload us files so people could download,but now we using SVN!
